Associates should be trained to be part of the evangelistic team.--When an effort is made to introduce the truth in an important place, our
136
ministers should give special attention to the instruction and training of those who are to cooperate with them. Colporteurs and canvassers are needed, and those who are fitted to give Bible readings in families, so that while the ministers are laboring in Word and doctrine, these can also be calling minds to the truth.--PM 307.
